data.name: Shatterstar
data.description: Champion gladiator from the future of Mojoworld, Shatterstar uses his expert swordsmanship and mutant powers as X-Factor's offensive powerhouse.

starItems.name: Shatterstar
starItems.description: Champion gladiator from the future of Mojoworld, Shatterstar uses his expert swordsmanship and mutant powers as X-Factor's offensive powerhouse.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all Bonus attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Always Bonus Attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all Bonus attacks

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all Bonus attacks

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

If this character has any non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all targets
Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to a Longshot ally

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to a Longshot ally.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all targets
 Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to a Longshot ally.

This attack cannot be blocked.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to a Longshot ally.

This attack cannot be blocked.

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to a Longshot ally.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

If Longshot is an ally, instead attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on all attacks
If Longshot is an ally, +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

If Longshot is an ally, instead attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on all attacks
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets
If Longshot is an ally, +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

If Longshot is an ally, instead attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on all attacks
If Longshot is an ally, +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

If Longshot is an ally, instead attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on all attacks
If Longshot is an ally, +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

If Longshot is an ally, instead attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on all attacks
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets
If Longshot is an ally, +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

If Longshot is an ally, instead attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage on all attacks
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets
If Longshot is an ally, +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

If Longshot is an ally, instead attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + Apply <color=#fff568>Defense</color> <color=#fff568>Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies.

1.description:
On self or ally Crit, Barrier self and <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
 > Non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage.
All allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage for Self and all non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies

2.description:
On self or ally Crit, Barrier self and <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
 > Non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage for Self and all non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies

3.description:
On self or ally Crit, Barrier self and <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage.
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
 > Non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> additional Crit Damage to <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage for Self and all non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies

4.description:
On self or ally Crit, Barrier self and <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage.
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
 > Non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health
On Crit +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for Self and all non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies

5.description:
On self or ally Crit, Barrier self and <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health

Gain <color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.
All allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage.
All <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Damage.
 > Non-summoned <color=#fff568>X-Factor</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Damage.
